text: Jane Briggs (“Janey”) Hart (October 21, 1921 - June 5, 2015) was an American aviator. She was the widow of Senator Philip A. Hart. She was born in Detroit, Michigan. She was a member of the NASA's Mercury 13. Hart was also an avid sailor and has sailed in the Port Huron to Mackinac Boat Race 15 times as part of an all-women crew.Born to Ride, Then to Fly: Mackinac Island’s Jane B. Hart , Mackinac Island Town Crier, December 11, 2010. Hart died on June 5, 2015 in West Hartford, Connecticut from Alzheimer's disease, aged 93. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American activists Category:American aviators Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:Disease-related deaths in Connecticut Category:People from Detroit
title: Jane Briggs Hart
